title: O-Shot® (PRP Shot for Women)
description: Doctor-led PRP injections placed along the clitoris and G-spot to boost lubrication, orgasm quality, and pelvic support—without hormones.
longDescription: The O-Shot® harnesses platelet-rich plasma (PRP) from your own blood to regenerate the clitoral network, anterior vaginal wall (G-spot), labia, and periurethral tissue. Concentrated growth factors trigger angiogenesis, collagen production, and nerve sprouting so arousal, lubrication, and orgasm return naturally.\n\nEvery appointment at Dr. SNA Clinic is private, doctor-led, and tailored around your hormonal stage—whether you are postnatal, perimenopausal, or simply seeking amplified sensation. Optional chaperones and comfort protocols (topical numbing, vibration analgesia, nerve blocks) ensure the experience is calm from start to finish.

seo.metaTitle: O-Shot London | PRP Shot for Women | Dr. SNA Clinic
seo.metaDescription: Experience the O-Shot in London with Dr. SNA Clinic. £1,150 treatment to restore lubrication, orgasm, and bladder control. Doctor-led, zero downtime.

overview.title: What Is the O-Shot?
overview.content: We draw a small sample of blood, concentrate the platelets using a dual-spin centrifuge, and re-inject this ‘liquid gold’ into the clitoris, anterior vaginal wall, labia, and periurethral sling. Growth factors such as PDGF, VEGF, IGF, and TGF-β stimulate collagen, nerves, and micro-circulation so arousal and lubrication feel effortless again. Because PRP is autologous, there is virtually zero risk of allergic reaction.
highlights: Targets nerves, blood flow, and tissue tone simultaneously
Comfort-first visit with optional female chaperone
Pairs perfectly with Ultra Femme 360 or EMSELLA

howItWorks.title: How PRP Restores Sensation
howItWorks.subtitle: Growth factors spark regeneration where you need it most
howItWorks.content: Once injected, PRP releases growth factors that instruct the body to heal. Platelets activate fibroblasts, stimulate angiogenesis, and encourage nerve sprouting. That means more circulation, thicker tissue, and heightened responsiveness.

safety.title: Safety & Governance
safety.content: All treatments occur in our CQC-regulated clinic using GMP-grade centrifuges, sterile kits, and doctor-only injections. Photos or intimate documentation are stored encrypted with explicit consent.

faq.question: How soon can I be intimate?
faq.answer: Immediately. Some women prefer to wait 24 hours if there is mild swelling, but it’s safe to resume the same day.

faq.question: Is the O-Shot painful?
faq.answer: Topical anaesthetic, vibration therapy, and optional nitrous oxide keep discomfort to a mild pressure sensation.

faq.question: How long do results last?
faq.answer: Most patients enjoy 12-18 months of results. We offer booster sessions if you’d like to maintain peak sensation.

faq.question: Can I do this while on HRT?
faq.answer: Yes. PRP is compatible with hormone therapy. We coordinate with your prescribing doctor if needed.

faq.question: Does it help lichen sclerosus?
faq.answer: PRP reduces inflammation and improves tissue integrity when paired with LED therapy and custom barriers.

faq.question: Do you offer payment plans?
faq.answer: Yes—0% finance over 6–12 months, arranged during consultation.
